title: 我的世界1.7.2崩溃
author: wanluyaoMC
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Daisy, daisy...

Time: 14-8-26 上午8:31
Description: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail

cpw.mods.fml.common.LoaderException: java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: net.minecraftforge.common.config.Configuration.getBoolean(Ljava/lang/String;Ljava/lang/String;ZLjava/lang/String;)Z
